name.en: Application of Optimal Theory to Civil Engineering
name.ch: 最佳化理論在土木工程之應用

goal.en: This course aims to train students having ability for apply optimization models for solving the realistic problems that arrise in practice.
goal.ch: 培養學生應用最佳化模式於各類土木工程實務問題之能力。

content.en:
(1) basic theory of mathematical programming
(2) optimization software introduction
(3) Air Operator management applications
(4) public works construction management applications
(5) public transportation planning and management applications
(6) Optimize financial planning applications
(7) Structural design applications
(8) Geotechnical design applications
(9) Maritime Management dust with analysis
(10) case studies
content.ch:
1.數學規劃基本理論
2.最佳化軟體介紹
3.航空營運管理應用分析
4.公共工程營建管理應用分析
5.大眾運輸規劃管理應用分析
6.最佳化財務規劃應用分析
7.結構設計應用分析
8.大地工程設計應用分析
9.海運管理塵用分析
10.個案研究

en.competency: Professional Knowledge in Civil Engineering and Urban Disaster Prevention
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance
